description: This file defines an AuthProvider class in Dart, managing authentication state, token persistence, and user information for a Flutter application. It includes methods for initializing auth state, login, registration, and logout, and interacts with shared preferences and an API client.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages authentication state, token persistence, and user info in a Flutter app.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Loads token from shared preferences and fetches user profile if token exists.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates the user, stores JWT token, and fetches user info.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user and logs them in upon success.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears stored authentication token and user info.
